name: Child Arcana
description:
Based off the brutal NES platformer Kid Icarus. Play as Pat to escape the underworld, ridding the world of evil demons as you go along! Collect their hearts to set their souls to rest.

Play with an Xbox 360 controller, or use the keyboard:
Z or L = Shoot
Space = Jump
Arrows or WASD = Move
Q = Exit game

This is a submission to Retro Remake Jam
